page.title: 17Central Heating in Streetly
page.content: In our class there were quite a lot of people with central heating (23). l7 people had gas fires which is more than I expected. I only expected about 10. 5 people had electric fires which was less than I thought. Not many people had moveable gas fires. There were 4. Nobody in the class has got an open fire, I didn't really expect they would. So more people had central heating because it is the newest idea. Nobody has an open fire because the coal is too much money. You would also have to employ a chimney sweep once a year to sweep the chimney. People in the country use logs from fallen trees for their heating. People in the mining areas use coal for their heating. {by Simon Miller { & Richard Ward
